text: George William Nankeville (24 March 1925 â€“ 8 January 2021) was a British middle distance athlete. He won the AAA mile title four times in five years from 1948 to 1952. He was born in Guildford, Surrey. He competed in the 1948 Summer Olympics. Nankeville died on 8 January 2021 at the age of 95.Bobby Davro's father has died ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2021 deaths Category:British athletes Category:Olympians for Great Britain Category:Sportspeople from Surrey
title: Bill Nankeville
